entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, referred to by his first name.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is a close friend of Harry's.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A potions master at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who has a complex relationship with Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is highly respected by Harry.

relationships.description: Hagrid is related to or has a connection with Dumbledore, as he is shocked by the news of his death.
